thread.title: A Google vai construir a sua primeira “smart city” em Toronto — idealista/news
thread.title_full: A Google vai construir a sua primeira “smart city” em Toronto — idealista/news

posts.title: A Google vai construir a sua primeira “smart city” em Toronto — idealista/news
posts.text:
Por mail A Alphabet, empresa-mãe da Google, está a preparar-se para construir uma pequena “smart city” (cidade inteligente), em Toronto, dando forma à ideia de como serão as cidades do futuro . A entrada da gigante de Silicon Valley no campo urbanístico inaugura uma nova era para as cidades. Porquê? Porque estas poderiam ceder parte do seu planeamento urbano, assim como dados, aos gigantes tecnológicos, em troca de "know-how". 
A Sidewalk Labs, subsidiária do Alphabet, a responsável pelo projeto na cidade do Canadá, é apresentada como uma empresa que "reimagina as cidades para melhorar a sua qualidade de vida" . A empresa recebeu a aprovação das autoridades de Toronto para ser responsável por projetar e construir parte dos 325 hectares de terras em frente ao Lago de Ontário. A Alphabet poderá estar a inaugurar um novo modelo de reabilitação urbana com este projeto, que dará prioridade ao tráfego a pé, combatendo o tráfego rodoviário. Entre outras coisas a cidade terá realidade aumentada, carros autónomos, edifícios inteligentes e publicidade personalizada. 
Inclui ainda habitação a preços acessíveis para os residentes de Toronto e espaços verdes e sustentáveis, bem como áreas dedicadas a escritórios, compras e lazer. Sidewalk Labs Apesar disso há aqueles que, em Toronto, suspeitam desta nova faceta do gigante tecnológico, especialmente se divulgarem dados privados dos cidadãos que irão "passear·" pelo novo "bairro da Google". Um editorial no jornal local, o Toronto Star, alertou para a possibilidade de, no futuro, as cidades desenvolvidas por gigantes tecnológicos poderem expor dados pessoais e transformar as ruas e espaços públicos “numa imitação de 'Minority Report'". Minority Report A Google poderá querer posicionar-se como uma grande gestora de dados gerados pelos cidadãos com o objetivo de lhes oferecer, depois, serviços como os que já oferece agora, em troca de publicidade na internet. 
Um projeto de vários arquitetos não vinculados à Google, conhecido como o "Google Urbanism", não olha para esse futuro como algo negativo, mas sim algo inevitável e que deve permitir às cidades diversificar as suas fontes de “receita”. google urbanism 
O “Google Urbanism” propõe que as cidades vendam "licenças" para as empresas de tecnologia para que estas tenham acesso às suas ruas e determinem onde é que os cidadãos se localizam. O objetivo? Transformar as ruas em “espaços de dados”, que anunciantes, gestores da cidade e outras empresas ou organismos possam utilizar para oferecer serviços, recomendações, ou publicidades muito mais sofisticadas do que aquelas que hoje ocupam as cidades. posts.title: 王者荣耀回防高地是什么意思 在哪设置回防高地-
posts.text: 王者荣耀游戏中常常会听见回防高地这句话，很多玩家不知道是什么意思，小编介绍了回防高地的意思以及方法，快来看看吧。 回防高地是什么意思？ 王者荣耀中高地指的是以最靠近水晶的三座塔为界的范围区域，听到回防高地的语音应该是敌方已经进攻或是准备进攻高地，所以需要回到高地防守，保护高地塔和水晶，因为高地塔一旦掉了，对面会出超级兵不说，水晶也很危险。 怎么回防高地？ 首先自然是回到高地，然后就是想办法清掉对面的兵线，这样可以大幅度减少高地塔和水晶的血量损耗，同时可以在适当的时机开团。高地团向来就是非常关键的，很多局都是因为高地团没打好直接被一波了又或是被翻了盘。 回防高地在哪设置？ [ 王者荣耀回防高地怎么发 ] 以上就是小编为大家带来的王者荣耀回防高地是什么意思的相关教程，希望可以帮助到您！

thread.section_title: A Segunda Vez: “Felipe Massa e a sua reaposentadoria.” – Start Racing F-1
thread.title: A Segunda Vez: “Felipe Massa e a sua reaposentadoria.”
thread.title_full: A Segunda Vez: “Felipe Massa e a sua reaposentadoria.”

posts.author: startracingf1
posts.title: A Segunda Vez: “Felipe Massa e a sua reaposentadoria.”
posts.text:
Por Carlos Frederico Pereira da Silva Gama  
Antes do Grande Prêmio do Canadá de 2017, Felipe Massa falava em prosseguir na Fórmula 1.
O retorno dramático do brasileiro após sua aposentadoria em Abu Dhabi, 2016, ainda estava gravado na memória de muitos fãs de F1.
O recém-aposentado foi trazido novamente ao mundo dos pilotos em atividade pela aposentadoria do campeão mundial Nico Rosberg. Evento ainda mais sensacional e inesperado.
Irônico destino: era a segunda vez que a aposentadoria de um campeão mundial favoreceu Massa.
Em 2006, foi a vez de Michael Schumacher pendurar o capacete (por alguns anos) e, com isso, nas suas próprias palavras, garantir o emprego do brasileiro na Ferrari.
A Scuderia já tinha contrato assinado com Kimi Raikkonen para 2007 e tinha tentado contratar anteriormente o bicampeão mundial Fernando Alonso.
Em Montreal, Massa largou no Top 10. Lance foi o 17º colocado. Quase 1 segundo e meio atrás.
Massa tinha 20 pontos de vantagem sobre a outra Williams. O jovem Lance Stroll tinha 0 pontos.
Os críticos mais apressados previam vida curta para o endinheirado canadense no circo máximo.
Contratado como tutor do estreante, Massa parecia a única esperança de Frank Williams no ano.
Na largada, Massa bateu em Carlos Sainz, então na Toro Rosso. Lance obteve os primeiros pontos.
Em dois lances, o destino do brasileiro na F1 acabava de mudar de direção.
No GP seguinte, no Azerbaijão, Lance foi mais rápido nos treinos. Ambos no Top 10.
Durante o conturbado GP, a Williams sentiu o primeiro cheiro de vitória desde a Espanha (2012).
Na 22ª volta, Massa era o 3º, graças a uma ultrapassagem histórica no ex-companheiro Kimi Raikkonen e no talentoso Esteban Ocon, da Force India. Lance era o 4º.
Os dois pilotos na frente, Lewis Hamilton e Sebastian Vettel, chegariam às vias de fato e teriam outros problemas. Não foram ao pódio. A luta livre na Force India ceifou Sérgio Perez do Top 10. O GP teve diversas relargadas e abandonos. A Williams de Massa foi um deles.
Lance prosseguiu. Na 34ª volta, era o 2º colocado. Atrás apenas do vencedor Daniel Ricciardo.
Quase sem acreditar, Stroll perdeu, de forma sensacional, o 2º lugar na linha de chegada para o corajoso Valtteri Bottas, com o melhor carro do grid. Um dos momentos inesquecíveis de 2017.
O canadense cruzou a linha em 3º lugar. Nesse dia, a Williams reconsiderou suas posições.
O mais jovem pódio da história da F1 apressou a aposentadoria de Felipe Massa.
Do Canadá em diante, Stroll fez 40 pontos e Massa, apenas 16.
O brasileiro voltou a largar no Top 10 apenas na Itália (7º). Stroll foi o 4º. 1 segundo na frente.
Durante esse período, Massa esteve ausente do GP da Hungria por problemas estomacais.
O piloto reserva Paul Di Resta saiu dos camarotes da Sky TV para o grid. Sem ter dado sequer uma volta anteriormente, conseguiu se classificar e completar dezenas de voltas com o mesmo carro motivo de reclamações de Massa no ano (além das eternas lamúrias sobre os pneus e o azar).
A reaparição sensacional de Di Resta – aplaudida por todo o grid – o tornou o substituto “natural”. Quando o brasileiro voltou a largar entre os 10 mais rápidos, no Japão, a Williams já fizera testes privados com Di Resta e o polonês Robert Kubica (recém-liberto da Renault). Paddy Lowe se disse satisfeito, sem dar outros detalhes. Toto Wolff lançou Pascal Wehrlein como candidato à “vaga” e, logo a seguir, Daniil Kvyat foi sugerido por Christian Horner para ser o novo companheiro de Stroll.
Massa deixou de ser unanimidade no seu time. No GP do México, Stroll o ultrapassou em pontos.
Situação recorrente desde a última pole e vitória de Felipe na F1, em Interlagos, 2008. O dia em que foi campeão por 34 segundos. Há quase uma década.
A ultrapassagem de Stroll na tabela significou o fim das esperanças de permanência na F1. Sem um cockpit, Massa passou a lutar pelo direito de dar adeus junto aos fãs, no Brasil, em Novembro.
A Williams disse não ter pressa para decidir. Há muitas opções: Di Resta, Kubica, Wehrlein, Kvyat…
Essa situação desconfortável motivou Massa a anunciar sua reaposentadoria em 4 de Novembro.
Sem título mundial (caso de Jenson Button), é difícil justificar a permanência de um veterano na F1, após derrotas seguidas para os companheiros de equipe. Sem grandes patrocinadores e disposição para buscar financiamento em equipes menores (como a que lhe permitiu estrear, a Sauber), Massa preferiu o conforto da TV e um cargo corporativo na nova F1 da Liberty Media.
Após um ano ausente do grid como piloto de testes da Ferrari em 2003, foram 14 temporadas consecutivas na categoria máxima do automobilismo, quase 280 GPs e estatísticas respeitáveis.
As derrotas para Nick Heidfeld, Giancarlo Fisichella, Schumacher, Raikkonen (2 vezes), Alonso (4 vezes), Bottas (3 vezes) e Stroll possivelmente serão menos lembradas do que os 34 segundos, ou as 2 vitórias no Brasil, a disputa roda a roda com Kubica no Japão em 2007 e a primeira despedida.
Massa foi o segundo brasileiro a disputar o título mundial após a morte de Ayrton Senna.
Foi o último vencedor nativo do GP do Brasil, o último piloto brasileiro a fazer uma pole position.
Com o fim prematuro da carreira de Felipe Nasr no circo, Massa se tornou, por inércia, o presente do Brasil na F1. Com o fim de sua trajetória, o país terá oportunidade de repensar sua participação na categoria máxima do automobilismo. Será a primeira vez desde um distante 1969.
Sem grandes investidores e talentos aguardando na fila de espera (alguns por muitos anos, como Brendon Hartley e Pierre Gasly), a “pátria de rodinhas” de Emerson, Senna e Piquet virou história.

Russian Automotive Market Research 
GM-АВТОВАЗ с 1 ноября 2017 года повысил розничные цены на автомобили Chevrolet Niva. Стоимость внедорожника комплектации L увеличилась на 5 тысяч рублей, комплектаций LC, GL, LE, GLC, LE+ – на 6 тысяч рублей. 
Таким образом, стоимость внедорожника Chevrolet Niva L составит 593 тыс. рублей, LC – 636 тыс. рублей, GL – 676 тыс. рублей, LE – 680 тыс. рублей, GLC – 725,5 тыс. рублей, LE+ – 738,5 тыс. рублей. posts.text:
Главная / Автомобильная промышленность / Новый сервис каршеринга делает ставку на отечественные марки автомобилей Новый сервис каршеринга делает ставку на отечественные марки автомобилей 
Russian Automotive Market Research 
В Москве в декабре нынешнего года появится новый оператор каршеринга под названием «Карусель». Клиентам компании предложат взять в поминутную аренду автомобилей Lada Granta в комплектации Comfort с автоматической коробкой передач, кондиционером, парктроником и электроусилителем руля. Стоимость аренды машины — 5 рублей в минуту. 
Стратегия компании заключается в увеличении популярности каршеринга среди горожан за счет низкой стоимости поездки. В свою очередь, доступные цены достигаются за счет использования отечественных автомобилей. 
На данный момент в Москве работают пять крупных сервисов каршеринга с автопарком больше 3,5 тысяч автомобилей. 2016 © Abiz.ru

thread.section_title: Mamaehrlich - bloggen -aber echt
thread.title: Wie mich das Mama sein verändert hat..
thread.title_full: Wie mich das Mama sein verändert hat..

posts.author: Mamaehrlich (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Wie mich das Mama sein verändert hat..
posts.text:
Nun bin ich seit knappen 1 1/2 Jahren Mama und bemerke immer wieder, wie sehr mich das Ganze doch verändert hat. Ich bin erst seit kurzer Zeit Mama und habe bestimmt noch nicht alles weiterentwickelt oder bemerkt, bestimmt gibt es auch genug Mamas, die mehr Erfahrung hätten darüber zu berichten aber hier und heute geht es eben um meine Geschichte, die ich euch erzählen möchte. Zunächst einmal bin ich viel sanftmütiger geworden. Seit ich Mama bin, bin ich sehr bedacht auf mein Auftreten, mein Erscheinungsbild. Dabei geht es nicht um Aussehen, sondern um meine Aura. Hört sich esoterisch an, ist es aber kaum. Ich spreche davon, dass empathische Menschen (zu denen Kinder ganz besonders gehören) die Stimmung eines anderen Menschen sehr schnell spüren. Sie können nachempfinden, welche Gefühle der Gegenüber grad in sich trägt. Damit Zac das nicht erdrückt, war mir von Anfang an klar, dass ich ihn meine schlechte Laune nicht zeigen möchte. Später, wenn er es erst einmal verstehen und einordnen kann wird sich das ändern. Später möchte ich ihm zeigen, dass es einfach ehrlich ist verschiedene Gefühle zu haben und auch zu zeigen. Es ist nicht immer alles rosarot und das darf er auch gern wissen. Nur eben jetzt, in diesem unschuldigen Alter, darf alles noch rosa und "wolkenweich" sein. Das sei ihm doch gegönnt.

Ich vertage meine "mieslaunigkeit" und auch meine Wut auf später. Ich versuche Streitigkeiten mit Tobias auf den Abend zu vertagen. Dort können wir ungestört sprechen aber nicht in Gegenwart von Zac. Früher konnte ich das nicht. Ich wollte Probleme sofort besprochen und gelöst haben. Egal ob jemand dagegen war. Das führte meistens zu noch mehr Streit. Ich habe ansatzweise gelernt, meine Emotionen zu kontrollieren und mich selbst zu besänftigen. Oft hört man mich am Tag tii durchatmen.

Generell bin ich gesetzter. Ich fühle mich angekommen, zu Hause. Ich weiß die Menschen die mir geblieben sind noch mehr zu schätzen als früher. Früher war alles einfach schneller..hektischer und voller Stimmungsschwankungen. Heute ist unser Alltag entschleunigt und deutlich ruhiger. Jeder hat sich eingefunden und fühlt sich geborgen. Ich war noch nie ein Partymensch und vermisse das Feiern daher auch heute nicht. Aber ich genieße das zu Hause auf dem Sofa gammeln noch viel mehr als früher. Dadurch wurde ich anscheinend auch "häuslicher" wie Tobias meint. Früher konnte ich nicht kochen. Mein Vorratsschrank war gefüllt mit Spagetti Napoli. Natürlich als Fertiggericht..
Heute kann ich tatsächlich ein paar Gerichte ganz lecker zaubern. Bratkartoffeln zum Beispiel XD

Als Mama achte ich irgendwie auch mehr auf mich selbst. Anfangs ging mein Verhalten genau in die entgegengesetzte Richtung. Ich wollte, dass meine Männer alles haben und an mir habe ich gespart. Mittlerweile ist das deutlich besser geworden. Ich bemerkte, dass ich dadurch nicht mehr so zufrieden war wie zuvor. Ich war unzufrieden mit meinem Aussehen und mit meiner Kleidung, gab das Geld was wir hatten aber nur für die anderen Beiden aus. Meine Unzufriedenheit beeinflusste unseren Alltag erheblich und meine Laune wurde angespannt und zickig. Ich habe beschlossen, mir selbst immer wieder kleine Aufmerksamkeiten zu beschaffen. Ich pflege mich mit gesünderen Pflegeprodukten wie z.B. Kokosöl und verzichte auf silikonhaltige Shampoos. Das kommt Zac ja auch zu gute. Immerhin kann er meine Sachen direkt mit benutzen und das macht mich wiederum glücklich.

Als Single war ich innerlich zerrissen. Ich war aufgewühlt und tot - unglücklich. Ich wusste nichts mit mir selbst anzufangen und habe Menschen gemieden. Es ging mir einfach im Ganzen schlecht. Durch meinen Sohn bin ich jetzt Mama. Ich hatte die Aufgabe meine Probleme auf die Kette zu kriegen und meine Angelegenheiten zu ordnen. Das tat ich. Ich trennte mich von Menschen die mir Probleme bereiteten und von Menschen die meines Erachtens einen schlechten Einfluss auf Zac haben würden. Und siehe da...mir geht es viel besser. Ein ganz schwerer Stein ist mir von der Brust gefallen. Das alles dank meinem Kind, welches mich unausgesprochen dazu zwang, mir selbst Gutes zu tun. Und nun habe ich meine Aufgabe im Leben gefunden.

Früher kamen mir durch meine Zerstreutheit auch immer wieder Fragen in den Sinn, wie was ist der Sinn des Lebens und was mache ich hier überhaupt. Es kam mir alles sinnlos vor und das manche Menschen sich in dieser Sinnlosigkeit auch noch für ach so wichtig hielten machte mich wütend. Ich verstand nicht, weshalb ich irgendwelchen gesellschaftlichen Konventionen nachgehen sollte, wenn ich doch nur so kurz leben durfte. Warum mich dann noch mit Dingen abmühen, die mir das bisschen Leben schwerer machten? Heute denke ich darüber nicht mehr nach. Vielleicht sollte ich es wieder aber man sagt ja bekanntlich, das Glück ist mit den Dummen. Heute freue ich mich einfach über das Hier und Jetzt. Ich lebe den Tag und baue viel weniger auf die Zukunft. Klar denke ich immer noch daran, was in 10 Jahren wohl sein wird und ich sichere unsere Zukunft auch immer ab. Aber dieses in Frage stellen von Allem hat aufgehört. Meine Gedanken drehen sich um andere Dinge. Dinge, die meine Familie und mich betreffen und auch Gedanken, die mich wieder mehr auf mich achten lassen. Gedanken um ein bewussteres Leben.

Wo wir grade schon beim bewusster Leben sind....In einem anderen Blogpost hatte ich das bereits angeschnitten. Ich nehme meine Umwelt viel intensiver wahr. Der Tunnelblick ist nahezu verschwunden. Zac kann jetzt äußern, was er erzählen möchte. Meistens mit hhhh, daa da, oder einem Kopfschütteln bzw. nicken. Liegt irgendwo Müll, dann weiß ich schon bevor er ihn sieht, dass da gleich wieder was kommt. Ich sehe, wie schmutzig unsere Umwelt eigentlich wurde und was für einen Dreck die Menschen hinterlassen. Ich sehe Verteilerkästen an den Straßenrändern, die ich zuvor immer übersah, einfach weil sie mir egal waren. Jetzt ist da aber jemand, dem diese ganzen Kleinigkeiten überhaupt nicht mehr egal sind. Für ihn sind sie die spannenden Kleinigkeiten, die seinen Alltag und sein Lernen ausmachen. Darum achte auch ich nun viel mehr darauf.

Dazu zählt auch, dass wir immer besonders deutlich "bitte" und "danke" sagen, die Menschen auf der Straße wieder viel mehr grüßen und auch an Höflichkeit hat es im Hause Mamaehrlich zugenommen. Wir versuchen Zac einfach die  (fast) perfekten Vorbilder zu sein und alles möglichst "richtig"zu machen.

Unsere Bekanntschaften haben sich ebenfalls verändert. Ein paar wenige aber wertvolle Freunde sind uns geblieben. Der Rest steckt noch in den Kinderschuhen. Sie waren nicht so weit wie wir..Heute treffen wir regelmäßig neue Leute mit Kindern. Oft unterhalten wir uns lang mit ihnen. Man wohnt in der selben Gegend und trifft sich immer wieder. Es kam ganz automatisch, dass aus den Spielplatzbekanntschaften, lockere Freundschaften wurden. Man hat die selben Interessen und die gleichen Themen. Man ist auf einer Wellenlänge. Ich habe mich also auch sozial verändert. Ich treffe Menschen wieder gern, bin offener und fröhlicher geworden. Ich habe die Ärmel hoch gekrempelt und mein ganzes Leben für mein Kind auf den Kopf gestellt. Ein Kind hat zu mindest bei mir einfach alles verändert. Mein Leben stand Kopf und erst durch ihn ist es wieder grade gerückt worden. Ich verdanke dir viel mein Kind.

Es gibt noch so viel mehr, was sich verändert hat aber ich glaube ihr alle habt verstanden was ich grundlegend meine. Es ist ein ganz spannender und individueller Prozess, den wir Eltern da durchmachen. Ist das dieses "erwachsen werden" von dem immer alle sprechen?

Was habt ihr an Veränderungen an euch entdeckt, seit ihr Mamas und Papas seid? Wie erging es euch bei dieser "Verwandlung"? Schreibt es mir gern in die Kommentare.

Küsschen links, Küsschen rechts

eure Franzi

posts.text:
Планетарий с самым большим куполом в мире открылся в Санкт-Петербурге 12:36 07.11.2017 To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video Facebook © Ruptly . 
В Санкт-Петербурге открылся новый планетарий, диаметр проекционного купола которого составляет 37 метров 
Это на два метра больше, чем в планетарии японского города Нагоя, который был внесен в Книгу рекордов Гиннесса.Новый планетарий разместился в историческом здании самого большого в России газгольдера, построенного более полутора веков назад. В нем хранился газ, который использовался для освещения городских улиц. После реставрации площадь комплекса составляет 4 тысячи квадратных метров и позволяет объединить звездный зал, музей с космическими экспонатами, интерактивные залы с виртуальной реальностью, образовательные классы и обсерваторию. 
Накануне 100-летия революции телеканал RT показал VR-ролики, посвящённые событиям 1917 года, в московском метро 78 
В пресс-центре состоялась пресс-конференция с участницами Всероссийского первенства по кекусин-кан каратэ, на котором каратистки из Южной Осетии заняли первое и третье места 98 
Традиционный Фестиваль света проходит в Санкт-Петербурге 4 и 5 ноября 11 
Президент России Владимир Путин в День народного единства посетил выставку "Россия, устремленная в будущее" в Манеже 83 Жители села Дменис считают недобросовестный подход к строительству памятника оскорблением памяти героев, сражавшихся за Родину 8 Недосыпание оказывает на мозг влияние, сравнимое с эффектом от употребления слишком большого количества алкоголя 1 Во время войны 2008 года одно из самых густонаселенных сел Южной Осетии сильно пострадало. Большинство зданий до сих пор в плохом состоянии, многие жители не в силах самостоятельно отстроить поврежденные дома 214 
Студенты Ереванского госуниверситета провели акцию протеста в связи с намерением властей отменить отсрочку от армии для учащихся вузов. Колумнисты 18+ Правила пользования 
Факт регистрации и авторизации пользователя на сайтах Спутник при помощи аккаунта или аккаунтов пользователя в социальных сетях обозначает согласие с данными правилами. 
Пользователь обязуется своими действиями не нарушать национальное и международное законодательство. Пользователь обязуется высказываться уважительно по отношению к другим участникам дискуссии, читателям и лицам, фигурирующим в материалах. 
Администрация вправе удалить комментарии, сделанные на языках, отличных от языка, на котором представлено основное содержание материала. 
Комментарий пользователя будет удален, если он: не соответствует тематике комментируемого сообщения; пропагандирует ненависть, дискриминацию по расовому, этническому, половому, религиозному, социальному признакам, ущемляет права меньшинств; нарушает права несовершеннолетних, причиняет им вред в любой форме, в том числе моральный; содержит идеи экстремистского и террористического характера, призывает к иным незаконным действиям; содержит оскорбления, угрозы в адрес других пользователей, конкретных лиц или организаций, порочит честь и достоинство или подрывает их деловую репутацию; содержит оскорбления или сообщения, выражающие неуважение в адрес Спутник; нарушает неприкосновенность частной жизни, распространяет персональные данные третьих лиц без их согласия, раскрывает тайну переписки; содержит описание или ссылки на сцены насилия, жестокого обращения с животными; содержит информацию о способах суицида, подстрекает к самоубийству; преследует коммерческие цели, содержит ненадлежащую рекламу, незаконную политическую рекламу или ссылки на другие сетевые ресурсы, содержащие такую информацию; продвигает продукты или услуги третьих лиц без соответствующего на то разрешения; содержит оскорбительные выражения или нецензурную лексику и её производные, а также намёки на употребление лексических единиц, подпадающих под это определение; содержит спам, рекламирует распространение спама, сервисы массовой рассылки сообщений и ресурсы для заработка в интернете; рекламирует употребление наркотических/психотропных препаратов, содержит информацию об их изготовлении и употреблении; содержит ссылки на вирусы и вредоносное программное обеспечение; является частью акции, при которой поступает большое количество комментариев с идентичным или схожим содержанием («флешмоб»); автор злоупотребляет написанием большого количества малосодержательных сообщений, или смысл текста трудно либо невозможно уловить («флуд»); автор нарушает сетевой этикет, проявляя формы агрессивного, издевательского и оскорбительного поведения («троллинг»); автор проявляет неуважение к языку, например, текст написан целиком или преимущественно набран заглавными буквами или не разбит на предложения. 
Администрация имеет право без предварительного уведомления пользователя заблокировать ему доступ к странице или удалить его аккаунт в случае нарушения пользователем правил комментирования или при обнаружении в действиях пользователя признаков такого нарушения.

thread.title: STORE MANAGER in KANSAS CITY KS
thread.title_full: STORE MANAGER in KANSAS CITY KS

posts.title: STORE MANAGER in KANSAS CITY KS
posts.text:
How Do You Compare to the Competition? Get facts about other applicants with a CareerBuilder Account Job Description Company Overview 
At Dollar General, our customer is at the center of everything we do! We are a fast-moving Fortune 200 publicly-traded company with more than 14,000 stores and 14 distribution centers in 44 states, growing by hundreds of stores each year. We work in an energetic atmosphere that embraces innovation and teamwork. At Dollar General, you can see a clear and fast path to career growth and success. We are committed to attracting talented and motivated people who can advance our mission of "Serving Others." Let's Grow Together! Job Details 
GENERAL SUMMARY: 
Responsible for the management of all employees in the effective planning and implementation of all store processes, including ordering, receiving, stocking, presentation, selling, staffing and support. 
DUTIES and ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS: Recruit, select and retain qualified employees according to federal and state labor laws and company policies; ensure store is properly staffed. Provide proper training for employees; conduct performance evaluations; identify gaps for appropriate solutions and/or counseling, up to and including termination. Make recommendations regarding employee pay rate and advancement. Communicate performance, conduct and safety expectations regularly; coordinate meetings and events to encourage safety, security and policies. Ensure that the store is appropriately staffed and effectively opened and closed each day. Personally open the store a minimum of two times per week; personally close the store a minimum of two times per week. Evaluate operating statements to identify business trends (including sales, profitability, and turn), expense control opportunities, potential shrink, and errors. Order to ensure the meeting or exceeding of in-stock targets; review ordering plan, seasonal direction and inventory management issues on a weekly basis; follow up on Basic Stock Replenishment (BSR)/cycle counts. Facilitate the efficient staging, stocking and storage of merchandise by following defined company work processes. Ensure that all merchandise is presented according to established practices; utilize merchandise fixtures properly including presentation, product pricing and signage. Maintain accurate inventory levels by controlling damages, markdowns, scanning, paperwork, and facility controls. Ensure the financial integrity of the store through strict cashier accountability, key control, and adherence to stated company security practices and cash control procedures. Provide superior customer service leadership. Maintain a clean, well-organized store; facilitate a safe and secure working and shopping environment. Ensure that store is adequately equipped with tools necessary to perform required tasks. Follow company policies and procedures as outlined in the Standard Operating Procedures manual, Employee Handbook, and company communications; ensure employee compliance. Complete all paperwork and documentation according to guidelines and deadlines. Qualifications 
KNOWLEDGE and SKILLS: Ability to read and interpret documents such as diagrams, safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedures manuals Ability to perform mathematical calculations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and percentages. Knowledge of cash handling procedures including cashier accountability and deposit control. Ability to perform IBM cash register functions to generate reports. Knowledge of inventory management and merchandising practices. Effective oral and written communication skills. Effective interpersonal skills. Knowledge of recruiting, interviewing, hiring, counseling and termination practices including legal compliance and internal processes. Knowledge of cash, facility and safety control policies and practices (deposits, store keys, SAFE program, etc.) Good organization skills with attention to detail. Ability to solve problems and deal with a variety of situations where limited standardization exists. 
WORK EXPERIENCE and/or EDUCATION: High school diploma or equivalent strongly preferred. One year of management experience in a retail environment preferred. 
COMPETENCIES: Aligns motives, values and beliefs with Dollar General values. Supports ownership by tapping into the potential of others. Acts as a liaison between the corporate office and store employees. Fosters cooperation and collaboration. Interacts with staff tactfully yet directly and maintains an open forum of exchange. Demonstrates responsiveness and sensitivity to customer needs. Applies basic principles of retail (i.e., ordering cycles, peak inventories, merchandise flow, etc.). Provides continuous attention to development of staff. Recruits, hires and trains qualified applicants to fulfill a store need. Ensures store compliance to federal labor laws and company policies and procedures. 
WORKING CONDITIONS and PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS: Frequent walking and standing. Frequent bending, stooping and kneeling to run check out station, stock merchandise and unload trucks. Frequent handling of merchandise and equipment such as hand-held scanner, pricing guns, box cutters, merchandise containers, two-wheel dollies, and U-boats (six-wheel carts). Frequent and proper lifting of up to 40 pounds; occasional lifting of up to 55 pounds. Occasional climbing (using ladder). Regularly driving/providing own transportation to make bank deposits and occasionally to attend management meetings and to other Dollar General stores. Fast-paced environment; moderate noise level. Occasionally exposed to outside weather conditions. 
#CC#

posts.author: Adeyinka Awotimayin (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Summary of some of the breaking news in Nigeria for Tuesday, November 07 2017.
posts.text:
2 explosions Rocks Maiduguri 

 Two explosions have occurred in some parts of Maiduguri, Borno capital.  

The first explosion occurred at about 8.30am, with the second following minitues later, at about 8.45am.  

 The explosions come a week after two female suicide bombers were intercepted by security personnel while attempting to invade the city to detonate explosives strapped to their bodies.  

 Nigeria Navy vows to deal with Niger Delta Avengers  

 The Nigerian Navy has vowed to deal decisively with any group or organization that threatens the territorial integrity of the nation.  


 It warned that nobody would be allowed to vandalize the nation’s assets under whatever guise.  

 The chief of naval staff, Rear Admiral Ibok-Ete Ibas, disclosed this on Monday when he visited the Nigerian Navy Engineering College in Sapele, Delta. 



 Boko Haram: Residents flee as terrorists invade community 

 Boko Haram terrorists have invaded Gulak village, the headquarters of Madagali Local Government Area of Adamawa State. 

The Adamawa State Commissioner of Information and Strategy, Ahmad Sajoh, told Channels TV that the Nigerian Army and the insurgents were engaged a gun battle while residents fled the village for their lives, hiding in bushes and mountains due to fear. 

 2019 Election: PDP dropped Nigeria in hell – Lai  Mohammed  

 The Minister of Information, Lai Mohammed, has revealed the probability of the All Progressives Congress (APC) winning the 2019 general elections, against the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP).  

 The Minister addressed journalists in Lagos saying it would be tragic for the nation to be controlled by the PDP as they left the nation in “hell”. 

 New ASUU strike looms as union evaluates deal with FG 

 A new ASUU strike might be strike might be looming across Nigeria Universities as the Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) is expected to hold its National Executive Council (NEC) meeting this week. 

 The ASUU NEC, which is the highest decision making body of the union, is to review Federal government’s implementation of the Memorandum of Action (MoA) it signed with the union before it suspended its strike a few months ago 

 ‘Militants’ kill British citizen kidnapped in Delta state  

 The British High Commission in Nigeria has confirmed that one of the four missionaries kidnapped in Delta State in October, by suspected militants, has been killed.  

 BBC reports that Ian Squire was an optician who, before his abduction and subsequent murder, was participating in a charity programme where the local residents were being administerd free medical.

posts.author: Guilherme Amaro
posts.title: Choro, alívio, descontração... Vitória no Dérbi mexe com elenco do Timão
posts.text:
atualizado às 06h06 comentários A vitória por 3 a 2 sobre o Palmeiras, no último domingo, causou uma explosão de sentimentos no elenco do Corinthians. A pressão do Dérbi era grande em cima dos jogadores, porque o Timão vinha em uma sequência de quatro partidas sem vitória e poderia ver a vantagem na liderança cair para apenas dois pontos. Jogadores comemoram gol no Dérbi Foto: Daniel Augusto Jr / LANCE! Logo após a vitória, Camacho saiu de campo chorando. Além do alívio pelo resultado, o volante se emocionou ao lembrar da trágica morte do pai, dias antes do primeiro Dérbi na temporada, em fevereiro. Na ocasião, Anízio sofreu um acidente no elevador particular de casa e não resistiu aos ferimentos. O jogador, então, foi liberado para ficar com a família no Rio de Janeiro e acabou perdendo a posição de titular. Quem também chegou ao vestiário da Arena Corinthians bastante emocionado foi o zagueiro Pablo. - Vencer um jogo como esse emociona qualquer jogador - resumiu o zagueiro. No dia seguinte à vitória, o clima no CT Joaquim Grava estava leve como há muito tempo não se via. Em campo, houve diversas brincadeiras entre os jogadores durante a atividade. Fora das quatro linhas também houve descontração, na conversa do zagueiro Balbuena com jornalistas após a entrevista coletiva. Um dos capitães do elenco, o defensor paraguaio disse que os jogadores ficaram mexidos com o jogo contra o Palmeiras. Ele acredita que a vitória no Dérbi dará mais confiança ao grupo nesta reta final do Brasileirão. SEM EUFORIA Apesar do alívio pela vitória, que deixou o Corinthians com seis pontos de vantagem na liderança do Brasileirão faltando apenas seis rodadas, a comissão técnica já trabalha com a ajuda dos capitães para conter a euforia dos jogadores. No vestiário da Arena e na reapresentação na segunda-feira, houve conversas para ter "pés no chão" e pensar apenas no Atlético-PR, próximo adversário. - Fazemos sacrifícios durante todo o ano, não podemos colocar tudo a perder - disse Balbuena. O técnico Fábio Carille também destacou a importância de frear a empolgação. Em entrevista coletiva após a vitória, ele disse que o "campeonato não está decidindo ainda" e rechaçou fazer contas pelo título. Na visão da comissão técnica, conter a euforia será o grande trabalho para os próximos jogos, a começar por quarta-feira, contra o Atlético-PR, na Arena da Baixada. Choro, alívio, descontração... Vitória no Dérbi mexe com elenco do Timão 5 fotos Jogadores comemoram gol no Dérbi Foto: Daniel Augusto Jr / LANCE!

thread.title: 1 dead, 15 hospitalized after carbon monoxide leak at church
thread.title_full: 1 dead, 15 hospitalized after carbon monoxide leak at church

posts.author: Rafael Lopez
posts.title: 1 dead, 15 hospitalized after carbon monoxide leak at church
posts.text:
1 dead, 15 injured after carbon monoxide leak at church By: Rafael Lopez Posted: Nov 06, 2017 11:48 PM CST Updated: Nov 06, 2017 11:48 PM CST 
MARSHALLTOWN - 15 people were taken to the hospital Sunday afternoon after a carbon monoxide leak at a church. One person died, their identity has not been released. 
According to the Marshalltown Fire Department and Unity Point EMS responded to 305 E. South Street around 2:45 p.m. Sunday on a report of a gas odor inside the church where people were passing out. 
On arrival, MPD Officers say they found people inside the building with complaints ranging from difficulty breathing to headaches and began removing people from the building. 
Fire officials say an initial test of the air inside the building found a high concentration of carbon monoxide. 
MPD and Unity Point EMS immediately began transporting patients to Unity Point-Marshalltown for treatment. In total, 15 victims were transported to the local facility. 
Inside the building, MFD crews say they found a gasoline powered generator in the basement that had been running to provide light and heat in the building. In addition, numerous gasoline cans were found that contained gasoline. 
Alliant Energy was called to the scene, but no electric or gas service was present in the building. 
Fire officials say of the victims transported to Unity Point-Marshalltown, five were air-lifted and three transported by ambulance to facilities in Iowa City and Des Moines. thread.section_title: Huffington Post South Africa
thread.title: South African Architecture Is Failing To Transform
thread.title_full: South African Architecture Is Failing To Transform

posts.author: huffingtonpost.com
posts.title: South African Architecture Is Failing To Transform
posts.text:
South African Architecture Is Failing To Transform There are only 65 black women who are registered architects in the country. 07/11/2017 11:31 SAST | Updated 07/11/2017 11:41 SAST 574 Garreth Van Niekerk News Reporter Getty Images 
New statistics from the South African Council for the Architectural Profession (SACAP) have revealed that there are only 65 registered black women architects in the country. 
This makes up less than 2 percent of the 3,859 architects registered on the SACAP database, of whom 2,339 are white men and 262 are black men. 
The low number of black women architects is indicative of the lack of transformation in this historically male-dominated field, experts say, as well as in the construction industry as a whole. 
"Whether you're in government or in private practice or in the corporate environment, most people know there's this thing called a transformation agenda. But very few people understand the implications of such an agenda, and what work needs to be done to begin engaging," Johannesburg-based architect Althea Peacock told HuffPost SA this week. 
Peacock is one of the founders of Lemon Pebble Architects , one of the country's first architecture firms that is 100 percent owned by black women. 
"There are so many factors why black women are not practising," she explained. 
"Not getting into a firm that will nurture them, not having the business acumen, not having access to a network of individuals who will either offer them work or patronage, or mentor them. 
"There's also the issue of having to choose whether to raise a family or supporting a family and the risks implied. Although, I will say that anyone starting their own business has to take some kind of similar risk." A post shared by LemonPebble Architects (@lemonpebblearchitects) on Jun 29, 2017 at 8:25am PDT 
Peacock is also a lecturer at Wits University. 
"A lot of issues also creep in during the time students are at varsity. I remember teaching first-year classes that were demographically quite evenly distributed, but by the time that group came to a master's level, the field thins significantly. So just the number of graduates reduce. Later, issues such as paying off student debt then outweigh the vision of starting a business," she said. 
Since its establishment in 2015, Women In Architecture South Africa (WiASA) has been trying to address these issues, among others. But many in the field say WiASA has been slow to act on its initial promises. 
"Our regional institutes and council, who should be at the forefront of this effort, are not," Peacock told HuffPost SA. 
They're aware of the barriers to entry affecting women in architecture, SACAP CEO Marella O'Reilly said. 
"Typically, young black women do not have access to the education stream required to study architecture -- maths, art and science -- and there is a low intake of women at SACAP-accredited architectural-learning sites," O'Reilly explained. These sites include most of the country's major universities as well select private institutions of higher learning. 
Entry requirements -- an average of 60 percent in matric to get into the technical course and 70 percent to get into architecture -- is a large factor, she said. In an attempt to address this barrier to entry, SACAP introduced a recognition of prior learning programme this year. 
But beside a high barrier to entry into diploma and degree programmes in architecture, there are other challenges facing black students generally. Most young black students for instance do not have access to sufficient funding to cover tuition and accommodation; on top of that, aspiring architects also have to budget for expensive materials without which they can't obtain their qualifications. 
Because there are so few women in architecture generally, we find ourselves living in a world where problems faced by women in the built environment are solved mostly by men. 
"Women and men have different needs and uses for public structures and systems," Andrew Fleming and Anja Tranovich argued in a recent Guardian article titled: Why aren't we designing cities that work for women, not just men? 
"In areas where resources of all kinds are more limited, these disparities become especially acute, affecting women's safety, movement and income. This is particularly true in parts of the global south, where urban planning struggles to even keep up with basic use -- much less encourage gender equality," they wrote.

posts.author: Dalton Timbo (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Ônibus é incendiado por criminosos em Fortaleza
posts.text: Inicio / NOTÍCIAS / Ônibus é incendiado por criminosos em Fortaleza Ônibus é incendiado por criminosos em Fortaleza Tweet Um ônibus foi incendiado na noite desta segunda-feira (6), no Bairro Barra do Ceará, em Fortaleza. De acordo com o comandante de Policiamento da Capital, coronel Francisco Souto, o coletivo da linha Cuca Barra/Parangaba (070) foi abordado por três homens por volta das 19h30 da noite, na Avenida Cel. Carvalho, próximo ao campo do Ferroviário Atlético Clube. O veículo estava parado no acostamento, quando os homens atearam fogo. Não houve registro de vítimas. Os suspeitos entregaram uma carta ao motorista do ônibus, explicando o motivo da ação, que foi em represália à morte de um adolescente de 15 anos no Bairro Floresta. Eles ainda fazem ameaças de que outros ônibus ainda podem ser incendiados. Segundo caso em cinco dias Este é o segundo caso de ônibus incendiados em Fortaleza em apenas cinco dias. Na última quinta-feira (2), um ônibus da linha Antônio Bezerra/Messejana (026) foi abordado por criminosos , na via lateral do Km-5 da BR-116, no Bairro Cajazeiras. Três adolescentes foram apreendidos , suspeitos de terem participado da ação. Eles alegaram que o delito foi "encomendado" por um criminoso encarcerado em uma das unidades prisionais do Estado, como pagamento por dívidas de drogas. Ainda segundo eles, o crime foi represália à morte do primo desse preso. Os jovens foram autuados em um ato infracional análogo a crime contra a segurança pública, por incêndio. FONTE:G1/CE Sobre Dalton Timbo Esta é uma breve descrição no blog sobre o autor. Editá-lo, No html e procurar esse texto Postagens Relacionadas

thread.title: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) REG NURSE - LEVEL C (B INC)
thread.title_full: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) REG NURSE - LEVEL C (B INC)

posts.title: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) REG NURSE - LEVEL C (B INC)
posts.text:
University of Michigan REG NURSE - LEVEL C (B INC) in Ann Arbor , Michigan 
Responsibilities* 
Provide coordinated clinical care to adult and pediatric patients and families in the Department of Orthopedics, Dominos Farm MedSport & NeuroSport clinics. 
Patient care (wound management, injections, pre-operative and post-operative care, patient education and other common clinic procedures/tests) is of utmost importance. 
Provide accurate and timely documentation of nursing care using MiChart. 
Coordinate clinical efforts of attending physicians, residents, fellows, mid-levels and students. Implementing clinical standards to improve patient outcomes. 
Candidate must be able to perform duties independently and be highly motivated and flexible to address the needs of patients and families. 
Candidate must be knowledgeable of available internal and external resources for clinical assessment, decision making, care management, and participate in departmental quality improvement and LEAN programs. 
Nursing Specific Info 
Required qualifications must be met by the candidate in order to be interviewed and considered for the position. Posting may be filled after the initial 5-day posting period. 
This UMPNC RN posting is posted as Nursing Framework REG NURSE - LEVEL C (B INC). 
Actual Nursing Framework LEVEL and salary will be determined at time of hire. 
Nursing Framework levels range from Level A to Level E. 
Applicants who have left the UMPNC bargaining unit must include on their resume dates of past employment including months and years of service along with effort. Positions less than 20 hours/week may be combined. 
If you have questions regarding this posting or would like assistance with nursing opportunities please contact Nurse Recruitment at (734) 936-5183. 
Required Qualifications* 
Current license to practice as a registered nurse in the State of Michigan. 
Minimum of 4 years of experience as a Registered Nurse. 
Minimum of 2 years of recent surgical nursing experience. 
Minimum of 2 years of recent RN experience caring for orthopedic patients. 
Demonstrated excellence in communication skills, including verbal, written and conflict management. 
Demonstrated ability to collaborate with a multi-disciplinary team including nursing, faculty, and ancillary staff. 
Demonstrated ability to effectively and efficiently prioritize, multi-task and problem solve with minimal supervision. 
Demonstrate advanced critical thinking skills in a fast-paced clinical environment. 
Proficient computer and keyboarding skills, use of electronic medical record documentation (MiChart), and Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Access & Power Point). 
Ability to plan and develop nursing care protocols and patient education tools. 
NOTE: Required qualifications must be met by the candidate in order to be interviewed and considered for the position. 
RESUME REQUIRED (for both internal & external applicants): 
You must attach a complete and accurate resume to be fully considered for this position. 
Desired Qualifications* 
Experience as an RN in the care of adult and pediatric sports injury medicine patients encompassing the pre-operative, post-operative and rehabilitation phase. 
BSN 
Recent experience with RN tele-health management. 
Experience leading clinical projects. 
Participation in quality improvement and Lean initiatives. 
Ambulatory care experience with orthopedic patients. 
Work Schedule 
Hours: 40 hours per week 
Shift/Hours/Days: Day shift; Monday- Friday based on clinic operational needs. 
Location:Domino's Farms Medsport & NeuroSport Clinics 
All new employees will be expected to float to a designated unit(s) in times of low census. 
Union Affiliation 
This position is covered under the collective bargaining agreement between the U-M and the Michigan Nurses Association and the U-M Professional Nurse Council union, which contains and settles all matters with respect to wages, benefits, hours and other terms and conditions of employment. 
Background Screening 
Michigan Medicine conducts background screening and pre-employment drug testing on job candidates upon acceptance of a contingent job offer and may use a third party administrator to conduct background screenings. Background screenings are performed in compliance with the Fair Credit Report Act. 
Mission Statement 
Michigan Medicine improves the health of patients, populations and communities through excellence in education, patient care, community service, research and technology development, and through leadership activities in Michigan, nationally and internationally. Our mission is guided by our Strategic Principles and has three critical components; patient care, education and research that together enhance our contribution to society. 
U-M EEO/AA Statement 
The University of Michigan is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. 
Job Detail

thread.title: Pre-Access Manager - Patient Access– Maitland
thread.title_full: Pre-Access Manager - Patient Access– Maitland

posts.title: Pre-Access Manager - Patient Access– Maitland
posts.text:
Job Description Patient Access - Pre Access Manager – Maitland 
Maitland seeks to hire Pre Access Manager who will embrace our mission to extend the healing ministry of Christ. Facility Profile: 
Established in 1908, Florida Hospital is one of the largest not-for-profit healthcare systems in the country, caring for more than a million patients each year. The Maitland Office Plaza houses our highly skilled teams that support our hospital system including Marketing, Patient Financial Services, Revenue Management, the Credit Union and Human Resources. The Trickel Building, a two-story office structure, creates an atmosphere of health and healing, with a healthy-style café and quaint chapel. The main lobby is filled with lush greenery and a light trickle of water, creating a holistic environment. Department Profile: 
The Pre-Access team is responsible for verifying eligibility, creating estimates, and securing authorization for the patients OP or IP visit. The services covered include Imaging, Surgery, Rehab and Inpatient admissions. Work Hours/Shifts: 
Monday – Friday; between 7am-7pm (M-TH), 7am - 5:30pm (F) Job Summary: 
Under general direction, plans, develops, organizes, directs and manages all inpatient, outpatient, rehabilitation and preregistration areas of the Patient Access and/or Pre Access Department, as assigned. Performs supervisory duties in absence of Senior Leadership. Creates synergies, maintains bidirectional communication, and acts as liaison between Patient Access and clinical and administrative partners within the hospital setting and beyond, ensuring open communication and collaboration toward common goals. Focuses on process improvement strategies with special focus on up-front cash collection outcomes to protect financial standing of Florida Hospital. Interviews applicants and processes new hire paperwork at assigned campus. Accountable for patient satisfaction and employee engagement scores. Actively participates in outstanding customer service and accepts responsibility in maintaining relationships that are equally respectful to all. Adheres to Florida Hospital Corporate Compliance Plan and to all rules and regulations of all applicable local, state and federal agencies and accrediting bodies. Knowledge, Skills, Education, & Experience Required: Proficient in time management with superior prioritization skills Self-motivator and quick thinker who is proactive and results oriented; responsive to ever-changing matrix of hospital needs and acts accordingly Ability to use discretion when discussing personnel/patient related issues that are confidential in nature Strong competence in Excel, PowerPoint, and Word Proficient in performance of basic math functions and communicates professionally and effectively in English, both verbally and in writing Five (5) years of experience (including one year of supervisory experience) in Patient Access/Patient Financial Services department or related area (registration, finance, collections, customer service, medical office, or contract management) Four (4) year college degree in Business, Healthcare or Health Services Administration, Health Information Management, Communications, Finance, Accounting, Public Administration, Human Resources, Management, or Marketing (Preferred) Licensure, Certification, or Registration Required: N/A Job Responsibilities: 
Demonstrates through behavior Florida Hospital’s Core Values of Integrity, Compassion, Balance, Excellence, Stewardship and Teamwork as outlined in the organization’s Performance Excellence Program Plans, develops, organizes, directs and manages all inpatient, outpatient, emergency (Patient Access only), rehabilitation and preregistration areas (Pre Access Department only), as assigned. Responsible for all Patient Access outcomes in assigned areas. Identifies problems proactively for expedited resolution. Creates synergies, maintains bidirectional communication, and acts as liaison between Patient Access and clinical, financial and administrative partners within the hospital setting and beyond, ensuring open communication and collaboration toward common goals. Ensures all patient accounts are created, verified, authorized and/or preregistered in timely manner with appropriate follow up for account completion and up-front collection in all registration or preregistration areas. Ensures 100% compliance with patient preregistration and/or patient discharge process. Enables department to achieve or exceed current standard of total time patient is in department by assisting with registration or preregistration as needed. Consistently ensures team members understand the importance of clear and thorough financial and insurance assessments, as well as accurate demographic information in order to maintain a close working relationship with clinical and financial partners and provide patients with excellent service. Focuses on process improvement strategies with special focus on up-front cash collections outcomes to protect financial standing of Florida Hospital. Reviews all collection reports available, communicates outcomes to team and leadership timely, and provides accurate statistical records and reports. Holds self and staff accountable for individual and team goals set by PA/PFS Department. Provides encouragement, education, and training to motivate team members in collections. May perform cashiering functions and other duties as required in support of the pre-established legal and financial guidelines of Florida Hospital. Assesses the work performance and productivity of all assigned team members. Presents written and verbal directions to employees to ensure well-informed status in performance of their job requirements as indicated. Evaluates and disciplines employees according to guidelines established by Department Administrative Director, Director, and Human Resources Department of Florida Hospital. Makes self-available to provide team members with tools and training needed to assist in meeting accuracy standard goals, minimize department registration errors, rejections, and avoidable denials. Interviews applicants for open positions at assigned campus using Carepix Behavioral Interview process. Processes paperwork for all new hires following departmental guidelines, and uses correct formula to quote hire in salaries, if necessary. Ensures 90 day on the job training program is successful at campus. Provides succession planning and encouragement to team members in order promote positive career growth within PA/PFS and Florida Hospital. Accountable for patient satisfaction and employee engagement scores, meeting goals set by Florida Hospital and PA/PFS department. Promotes an atmosphere of open communication for staff, clinical partners, and customers (patients, guests, families, staff, physicians, vendors, payers, etc.) at all times, interacting in a professional manner in up-front collection procedures, service recovery initiatives, Payer Joint Operating Committees (in Pre Access) and general patient or department complaints. Meets monthly budget goals by managing staff levels that are within set labor standards and limiting use of overtime and providing continual coverage (24-hour coverage in Emergency Department/weekend coverage for Pre-Access) in order to offer prompt patient service and be available for all clinical partners (pre)registration needs. Regularly reviews monthly budget and volume reports. Limits use of overtime by monitoring productivity. Ensures employee performance and attendance documentation is current and accurate. Adheres to HIPAA regulations by verifying pertinent information to determine caller or visitor authorization level before releasing account information. 
If you want to be a part of a team that is dedicated to delivering the highest quality in patient care, we invite you to explore the Pre – Access Manager opportunity with Maitland and apply online today. Job Keywords:

thread.title: [마천문 수강후기] 《마천문 듣고 귀 뚫렸다?!》
thread.title_full: [마천문 수강후기] 《마천문 듣고 귀 뚫렸다?!》 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 마스터1000문장
posts.title: [마천문 수강후기] 《마천문 듣고 귀 뚫렸다?!》
posts.text:
진솔한 수강후기 [마천문 수강후기] 《마천문 듣고 귀 뚫렸다?!》 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/master1000s/221134690731
《 마천문 듣고 귀 뚫렸다 ?! 》
안녕하세요 ? 2200 문장에 들어서는 마천무너 이지혜입니다 . 1000 문장 때 수강 후기 한번 , 2000 문장 때 수강후기 한 번 썼던 제가 2200 문장 째에 수강후기를 쓰는 이유는 요즘 제 청취가 달라졌기 때문입니다 . 마천문을 두 번 하면서 ‘ 라이언 선생님만큼 못 듣는다 ’ 는 생각에 속상 반 , 존경 반으로 열심히 라이언 선생님의 똑 떨어지는 발음을 따라하던 제가 , 요즘 난이도 별 4 개인 마천문 추천 영상을 술술 받아적는 경험을 하게 되었기 때문입니다 . 어떤 변화가 있었던 걸까요 ? 남들이 말하는 , 그 “ 귀 뚫렸다 ” 를 경험하게 된 걸까요 ? 아닙니다 . 정확히 말하자면 , “ 영어에 대한 근본적인 태도가 달라졌다 ” 를 경험하게 된 것 같아요 .
마천문의 강점은 교과서적인 공식이 아닌 , 살아있는 비공식을 배운다는 데 있습니다 . 마천문 강의의 원칙은 원어민들이 일상에서 쉽게 내뱉는 실생활 영어를 흉내내고 , 그들이 사고하는 영어 방식과 문화를 습득하는 데 있는데요 , 마천문에서 배운 것들을 매일 연습하면서 , 알게 모르게 스며든 것들이 제 뇌의 ‘ 사고의 물꼬 ’ 를 틀어 , 영어의 새 물꼬를 내고 , 그 새 길로 새로운 사고를 하면서 , 영어를 대하는 제 사고방식 자체가 , 즉 제 뇌가 근본적으로 변했다는 겁니다 . 이 원칙은 뇌 과학에서 “ 장기간 계속하는 매일매일의 연습이 뇌 구조를 바꾼다 ” 는 과학적 사실과도 부합하는데요 , 그것에 대한 증거로 저는 예전보다 훨씬 더 원어민들의 영어발음이 잘 들립니다 . I think influences me today I started singing young age, so quickly as you learn, quickly as you mind, pick up one stuff. 말은 글처럼 마침표나 쉼표가 없지 않습니까 ? 잘 듣는 사람은 influences 에 s 를 듣는 사람일 것입니다 . 그러나 영어식 사고방식이 있는 사람은 이 말을 들으면서 , 쉼표와 마침표를 찍고 , 생략된 것들을 떠올리는 사람입니다 . 즉 , I think (It) influences me today. I started singing (at a) young age, so (as) quickly as you learn, (as) quickly as you mind, pick up one stuff. 이렇게 말입니다 .
물론 , 여러 번 되풀이 하면서 듣고 또 듣고 받아 적은 거예요 . 한번에 이렇게 들으면 , 제가 원어민이게요 ? 이렇게 영어가 들리기 시작한 건 얼마 안됐습니다 . 마천문을 하루도 빠짐없이 머릿 속에 빙빙 돌려가며 , 산 지 언 2 년 반 . 드디어 이 수준까지 올라갔습니다 . 어떠세요 ? 여러분 ? 자극이 되시나요 ? 저 같은 체험을 하고 싶으신 분들은 최소 한 번 , 두 번 , 세 번 과감히 마천문에 투자하세요 . 투자하면 여러분들은 돈을 먼저 떠올리시는데 , 학원비 투자는 어찌보면 쉽죠 . 여러분의 시간과 노력 , 믿음을 투자하는 것 , 제가 말하는 것은 그것입니다 . 이런 투자는 쉽지 않습니다 . 자기 합리화와 포기하곤 했던 자신만의 패턴에 빠지기 쉽거든요 . 그러니까 , 수업을 계속 들으세요 ! 라고 과감히 , 여러분들께 권합니다 . 손 놓지 말고 , 라이언 선생님과 저 같은 마천무너들이 뜨거운 열정을 가지고 투지를 불태우는 이 곳 , 마천문으로 오세요 ! 마천문에 입문하시는 길이 여러분의 영어 인생을 꽃 길로 만드는 길이라고 자부합니다 ! 읽어주셔서 감사합니다 .
- 마천무너 이지혜 올림 .

posts.author: alvinareana
posts.title: Hadiah Dari Langit Bagian 1 : Perempuan yang Berlalu
posts.text:
Gerbong kereta pagi ini membawaku menyusuri banyak kenangan. Aku kembali meninggalkan tempat paling nyaman.
Namun tiba-tiba sapamu mengusik lamunan. Akhirnya kubiarkan rasa penasaran menyelesaikan tugasnya ; membuka seuntai sapa yang kau kirim sepagi ini.
“Adakah temu yang mampu meyakinkan rindu?” 
Ada yang berdesir. Membayangkan bagaimana jadinya jika perjalanan ini sungguh mengantarkanku melihat wajahmu secara nyata.
Akhirnya kubiarkan ingatanku mengurai langit helai demi helai, kamu lucu dan aku menahan senyum sendirian. Jika ada seorang paruh baya melihatku, mungkin ia akan mengatakan “Nak, betapa tidak pintarnya kamu, menyembunyikan rasa” 
Ternyata perjumpaan kita telah lama dilipat masa. Bagiku lebih baik memilih berlalu dibanding memperhatikan salah tingkahmu itu.
Bagaimana bisa kutumbuhkan rindu, sedang aku tidak pernah menyadari ada benih yang rutin kau tanam dibawah ilalang.
…

thread.title_full: В Приморье появится предприятие по выпуску электромобилей

posts.author: redactor redactor
posts.title: В Приморье появится предприятие по выпуску электромобилей
posts.text:
Главная / Автомобильная промышленность / В Приморье появится предприятие по выпуску электромобилей В Приморье появится предприятие по выпуску электромобилей 
Russian Automotive Market Research 
Через два года в Приморье начнется серийное производство электрокаров. Выпуском экологически чистых автомобилей займется российско-японское предприятие «Прометей», которое было создано корпорацией Arai Shoji Co. Ltd и «Сумотори». 
Первоначально планировалось организовать производство электромобилей на базе подержанных автомобилей из Японии. Всего компании планировали импортировать в Приморье до 5 тыс. автомобилей в год. Однако позже было решено заняться выпуском собственных электрокаров. 
Уже в следующем году инвесторы начнут реализовывать план по строительству нового завода, и в 2019 году с конвейера начнут выходить новые автомобили. Объем финансирования проекта составляет 500 миллионов рублей. 2016 © Abiz.ru

thread.section_title: eirc63
thread.title: неплохая попытка
thread.title_full: неплохая попытка

posts.title: неплохая попытка
posts.text: утопия она на то и утопия, чтобы обломиться.Все довольно просто, люди - говно. натуру их не переделать.Зачистили основательно класс, который привык сидеть на шее у других, похрустывая французскими булками. Дык мигом (по меркам истории) сформировался новый такой же класс.Все эти бывшие комсомольцы, коммунисты сравшие в мозг научным коммунизмом, вдруг оказались владельцами заводов-параходов и славят теперь рынок. И практически полный кргуг за сто лет совершила история, я думаю уже зреют законы в Думе, на счет душ по 200-300 каждому! Все эти бывшие коммунисты и комсомольцы даже обзавелись титулами и родословными, сплошные бароны и графы(например, кандидат Собчак - графиня).Вообщем, попытка 100 лет назад была серьезная, затронула весь мир. Побочный эффект - бешенная гонка технологий, космос, социальная политика (некоторые западные страны, даже ближе к светлому коммунистическому будщему оказались, чем мы). Но в итоге, мы опять практически на том же самом месте. И так, как социальное неравенство продолжает расти, все убыстряющимися темпами, есть шанс зайти на второй круг.Вместо искоренения причин, долбоебы занимаются переписыванием истории, клепанием убогих фильмов и захоронением Ленина.Вот да, на улицах бароны будут безнаказанно давить джипами быдло, но посмотрев правильный сериальчик, все скажут - так и надо, свободу Маре Багдасарян! С праздником!

thread.title: «Омский каучук» подтвердил соответствие требованиям Росприроднадзора
thread.title_full: «Омский каучук» подтвердил соответствие требованиям Росприроднадзора

posts.author: redactor redactor
posts.title: «Омский каучук» подтвердил соответствие требованиям Росприроднадзора
posts.text:
Главная / Экология / «Омский каучук» подтвердил соответствие требованиям Росприроднадзора «Омский каучук» подтвердил соответствие требованиям Росприроднадзора 
«Омский каучук» (входит в ГК «Титан») прошел очередную проверку Росприроднадзора, ставшую третьей по счету во втором полугодии 2017 года, сообщает пресс-служба предприятия. Согласно акту проверки Управлением Росприроднадзора по Омской области полигона промышленных отходов ПАО «Омский каучук», нарушений законодательства в области охраны атмосферного воздуха не выявлено. 
Внеплановая выездная проверка полигона осуществлялась с 4 по 31 октября 2017 года на основании распоряжения руководителя Управления Росприроднадзора по Омской области с привлечением специалистов Центра лабораторного анализа и технических измерений по Омской области. Согласно выводам проверяющего ведомства, полигон не является источником загрязнения атмосферного воздуха в Омске (Акт №АТ-768в от 01.11.2017 г.). 
Источник: PLASTINFO

posts.title: Петербургские фармпредприятия увеличат экспорт на 25%
posts.text:
Главная / Здравоохранение / Петербургские фармпредприятия увеличат экспорт на 25% Петербургские фармпредприятия увеличат экспорт на 25% 
Правительство Санкт-Петербурга ожидает рост объема экспорта фармацевтической продукции, произведенной на предприятиях городского кластера, на 20–25% по итогам 2017 года. 
В 2016 году предприятия городского фармкластера экспортировали продукцию на сумму более 1,7 млрд рублей. Поставки осуществлялись в Азербайджан, Белоруссию, Молдавию, Украину, Марокко, Лаос и другие страны СНГ и дальнего зарубежья.

posts.title: 116 млрд рублей кредитов получили растениеводы
posts.text:
Главная / Сельское хозяйство / 116 млрд рублей кредитов получили растениеводы 116 млрд рублей кредитов получили растениеводы 
С начала 2017 года Россельхозбанк выдал порядка 116 млрд рублей кредитов на текущие и инвестиционные цели предприятиям в сфере растениеводства. Объем кредитования в данном сегменте увеличился на 20% по сравнению с аналогичным периодом 2016 года, что способствовало росту технологизации отрасли, развитию парка сельхозтехники и оборудования, повышению качества посевного материала и обработки земель. 
Из общей суммы займов растениеводам порядка 60 млрд рублей приходится на краткосрочное кредитование, 56 млрд рублей выдано на инвестиционные цели – расширение машинотракторного парка, строительство хранилищ, покупку земель под растениеводство. 
Источник: Agro.ru

posts.title: Азербайджан осудил ракетную атаку на Саудовскую Аравию
posts.text:
Азербайджан осудил ракетную атаку на Саудовскую Аравию 7 ноября 2017 13:10 168 #МИД АЗЕРБАЙДЖАНА 
"Мы осуждаем ракетную атаку на Королевство Саудовская Аравия". 
Как передает Day.Az , об этом заявил руководитель пресс-службы Министерства иностранных дел Азербайджана Хикмет Гаджиев, отвечая на вопросы АПА . По его словам, такого рода негативные события могут обострить еще больше и без того напряженную ситуацию в регионе: "Мы призываем к усилению политических и дипломатических усилий с целью обеспечения мира и стабильности в регионе". 
Отметим, что 4 ноября система противовоздушной обороны Саудовской Аравии сбила на северо-западе Эр-Рияда баллистическую ракету. По сообщению канала "Al-Arabia", ракета была выпущена йеменскими повстанцами. Сообщается, что атака была предотвращена вовремя, пострадавших среди населения нет.

posts.title: Gezeker ve Kapan’a IJF’dan görev
posts.text:
TEKNOLOJİDE KADINLARIN ZAMANI Gezeker ve Kapan’a IJF’dan görev Judo Federasyonu Yönetim Kurulu Üyesi Kaya Gezeker ile Genel Koordinatörü Mesut Kapan’a, Uluslararası Judo Federasyonu’ndan (IJF) yeni görevler verildi. 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:15   @BursaHaberMedya 
Judo Federasyonu Yönetim Kurulu Üyesi Kaya Gezeker ile Genel Koordinatörü Mesut Kapan’a, Uluslararası Judo Federasyonu’ndan (IJF) yeni görevler verildi. 
IJF Başkanı Marius Vizer tarafından imzalı olarak gönderilen görevlendirmede; Federasyon Dış İlişkiler Sorumlusu Gezeker’in IJF- Polis ve Asker Komisyonuna, Genel Koordinatör Kapan’ın ise Gelişim Komisyonu üyeliklerine atandığı belirtildi. Böylelikle Türkiye Judo Federasyonu’nun uluslararası federasyonlarda görevli üye sayısı da dörde çıkmış oldu. Daha önce Metin Özkan Avrupa Judo Birliği (EJU) Hakem Komitesi, Dr. Turgay Demiray ise EJU Sağlık Kurulu üyesi olarak görev yapmaktaydı. 1

posts.title: На закупку инактивированной полиомиелитной вакцины выделено 1,2 млрд рублей
posts.text:
Главная / Здравоохранение / На закупку инактивированной полиомиелитной вакцины выделено 1,2 млрд рублей На закупку инактивированной полиомиелитной вакцины выделено 1,2 млрд рублей 
Почти 1,2 млрд рублей было выделено правительством России на ликвидацию дефицита инактивированной вакцины от полиомиелита. План по вакцинации и ревакцинации за полгода выполнен на 70%. Об этом ТАСС сообщили в пресс-службе Министерства здравоохраненияРоссии. 
Ранее Минздрав уже предупреждал об общемировом характере дефицита инактивированной полиомиелитной вакцины. Такое положение объясняется возросшей мировой потребностью в препарате — в планах у ВОЗ к 2019 году перейти на использование инактивированной вакцины. 
Источник: Новости GMP

thread.title: Robert Mugabe sacks Vice President Emmerson Mnangagwa
thread.title_full: Robert Mugabe sacks Vice President Emmerson Mnangagwa

posts.author: BellaNaija.com
posts.title: Robert Mugabe sacks Vice President Emmerson Mnangagwa
posts.text:
Robert Mugabe sacks Vice President Emmerson Mnangagwa 07.11.2017 at By BellaNaija.com 1 Comment Robert Mugabe 
Zimbabwean President Robert Mugabe has relieved his vice president Emmerson Mnangagwa of his duty, the country’s information minister, Simon Khaya Moyo , announced. 
According to Guardian , the move is expected to clear the way for the first lady, Grace Mugabe , to succeed him as president. 
The first lady and Mnangagwa have been feuding for a while, and Moyo said the vice president was sacked for exhibiting disloyalty, disrespect and deceitfulness. 
Elections are due in 2018, and visibly ill 93-year-old Mugabe is expected to step down. 
While Mnangagwa, a former intelligence chief, had been expected to take over power, the first lady has been making moves lately to take over his job. 
She had said at a party meeting on Saturday: “What if I get in? What’s wrong with that? Am I not in the party? If people know that I work hard and they want to work with me, what is wrong with that?” 
She also accused Mnangagwa of being the “root cause of factionalism” in the party, Zanu-PF. 
Mnangagwa had fallen ill at a rally and had to be airlifted to South Africa. He had claimed he was poisoned. Grace had also debunked claims that she poiaoned him. 
Mnangagwa had been appointed vice president in 2014 after Joice Mujuru was sacked. 
Mujuru had also been accused by Grace Mugabe of plotting to remove the president. About BellaNaija.com

posts.title: Более 50 застройщиков уже внесли средства в Фонд дольщиков
posts.text:
Главная / Строительство / Более 50 застройщиков уже внесли средства в Фонд дольщиков Более 50 застройщиков уже внесли средства в Фонд дольщиков 
В Фонд защиты прав граждан на сегодняшний день внесли взносы 54 застройщика из 24 регионов России, заявил глава Минстроя РФ Михаил Мень. 
Он уточнил, что на компенсационный счет фонда, где будут накапливаться средства для защиты прав дольщиков, от каждого из застройщиков поступила сумма в размере 1,2% от стоимости договоров участия в долевом строительстве (ДДУ).

Amped To Learn Half Of Hawaii’s Coral Reefs Bleached Africa's King Of Recycled Art Comes To SA NEWS Attack At TV station In Afghan Capital Claims Lives -- Reports A police official says three people including a suicide bomber have attacked a TV station in the capital Kabul, according to Associated Press. 07/11/2017 11:15 SAST | Updated 19 minutes ago Reuters SHAH MARAI / Getty Images Afghan security personnel gather at the site of an ongoing attack on a television station in Kabul on November 7, 2017. A private television station in the Afghan capital came under attack on Tuesday by a number of gunmen who broke into the building after an explosion, officials said.
A tweet from the station's Twitter account said staffers reported several casualties inside the building and staff members reached by telephone said between two and five people appeared to have been killed.

Omar Sobhani / Reuters Afghan policemen keep watch at the site of an attack at a private television station in Kabul, Afghanistan, November 7, 2017. 
Kabul police spokesman Basir Mujahid said casualties were feared but he said the number was still unclear.
He said the attack began with an explosion at the gate of the station followed by gunmen who stormed in. One of the attackers was killed immediately but others fought off security forces with hand grenades.
As the attack unfolded, Shamshad TV, a Pashto language broadcaster, stopped normal programing, transmitting only a still image.
There was no immediate indication of the identity of the attackers but Taliban insurgents issued an immediate denial that they were involved.
The attack is the latest in a series of assaults on Afghan journalists and media workers. Last year seven members of Afghanistan's largest private television station, Tolo, were killed by a Taliban suicide bomber.
Reporting by Mirwais Harooni; Editing by Nick Macfie
